meanings.definition: The quality or state of being melodious.
meanings.sent1: Her melodiousness filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: The melodiousness of the song brought tears to my eyes.
meanings.sent3: The melodiousness of the birdsong made the grumpy old man smile.
meanings.sent4: The melodiousness of the flute was like a gentle breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the melodiousness of her laughter.

meanings.definition: The pleasing sound quality of a musical composition.
meanings.sent1: The melodiousness of the orchestra was enchanting.
meanings.sent2: I could listen to the melodiousness of this piano piece all day.
meanings.sent3: The melodiousness of the violin made the baby dance with glee.
meanings.sent4: The melodiousness of the symphony was a soothing balm for my soul.
meanings.sent5: The melodiousness of the choir lifted everyone's spirits.
